presentation.objective: To introduce the present perfect tense to students.
presentation.connection: I will ask students to think about their own experiences and share them with the class.

practice.real_life_application: Students will be able to use the present perfect tense to talk about their own experiences.
practice.feedback_method: I will provide feedback on students' use of the present perfect tense during the practice activities.

production.learner_interaction: Students will work in pairs to create dialogues using the present perfect tense.
success_criteria: correct use of the present perfect tense
appropriate use of vocabulary and grammar

presentation.objective: To introduce the past simple tense to students.
presentation.connection: I will ask students to think about their past experiences and share them with the class.

practice.real_life_application: Students will be able to use the past simple tense to talk about past events.
practice.feedback_method: I will provide feedback on students' use of the past simple tense during the practice activities.

production.learner_interaction: Students will work in pairs to create dialogues using the past simple tense.
success_criteria: correct use of the past simple tense
appropriate use of vocabulary and grammar

presentation.objective: To introduce the future simple tense to students.
presentation.connection: I will ask students to think about their future plans and share them with the class.

practice.real_life_application: Students will be able to use the future simple tense to talk about future events.
practice.feedback_method: I will provide feedback on students' use of the future simple tense during the practice activities.

production.learner_interaction: Students will work in pairs to create dialogues using the future simple tense.
success_criteria: correct use of the future simple tense
appropriate use of vocabulary and grammar
